column2: the snow departed as quickly as it came
column3: and two days after their sleigh ride there was scarcely a vestige of white on the ground. Tennis was again possible and a great game was in progress on the court at Pine Laurel. Patty and Roger were playing against Elise and Sam Blaney
column4: and the pairs were well matched.But the long-contested victory finally went against Patty
column5: and she laughingly accepted defeat."Only because Patty's not quite back on her game yet
column6: Roger defended; this child has been on the sick list
column9: and she isn't up to her own mark.""Well
column10: I like that!" cried Patty; "suppose you bear half the blame
column13: he is so absorbed in his own Love Game

column16: let it go at that. And it's so
